title: ISS Daily Summary Report – 7/02/2024
summary: Boeing CST-100 Crewed Flight Test (CFT): The CFT crew continued assisting the ISS crew in cargo transfer and stowage cleanup activities.  The CFT crew also tested the air flow of the Plant Habitat Air Pump-Filter and performed a bi-weekly housekeeping inspection. Payloads: B Complex: A crewmember consolidated the contents of the partially filled supplement bottle …
